"No, no interfering, we just have to watch them. We attack whomever survive=
s." Sinesis says. He meant it...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: il=
ovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 11=
:12 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Twister


  *Twister follows Sinesis and look=
s at Plintissa and Dracona*

  Twister: Woah, looks like a battle. Is it a =
death fight? Or maybe a retreat fight where the first to retreat loses?

  =
*Twister asks Sinesis*

  Twister: I don't think we should interfear or any=
thing and find our own pray. What do you think?

  *Twister says to Sinesis=
*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 10:09 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


=
    Sinesis shrugs.

    "Let's just go out scouting." Sinesis says. He pos=
ed and put Sinister's sword away. Then he walked out the door and noticed t=
he battle about to take place between Plintissa and Dracona...
      ----- =
Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:56 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW
=


      Twister


      Twister: Okay, let's ask her. Over Commlink or face=
 to face?

      *Twister asks Sinesis*

        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Fr=
iday, August 04, 2000 9:37 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        "Maybe, ho=
w about we ask Dracona?" Sinesis says to Twister...
          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
          Subject:=
 Re: NBW


          Twister

          *Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes h=
er hand*

          Twister: Do you know of anyone that would like to die?
=

          *Twister asks Sinesis*

            ----- Original Message -----=
 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:52 PM
            Subject: Re: NBW


    =
        Sinesis eagerly shakes Twister's hand.

            "Partners!" Sin=
esis says...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From=
: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent=
: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


        =
      Twister


              *Twister looks at Sinesis*

              Twi=
ster: It seems that we have something in common and I need a partner too.

=
              *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

              Twister:=
 Partner?

              *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extended*

   =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
 =
               To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, August=
 04, 2000 4:45 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


                "Trave=
ling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What about =
all of the times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not fair. I wi=
sh I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

    =
            "Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
       =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: iloveallli=
zards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Fr=
iday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
                  Subject: Re: NBW


        =
          Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



                  *Twister looks at =
the sword and sighs*

                  Twister: I'll have to get used to t=
he fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alo=
ne....

                  *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the =
energon eagles into her arm compartment*


                  *Blizzard look=
s at Sinister and smiles*

                  Blizzard: I wonder what's happ=
ening back at the base.



                  *Infectra smiles back at Airbo=
mber*

                  Infectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust=
 the others but....

                  *Infectra sighs*

                  =
Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard t=
o thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

                =
  *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


                    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:2=
0 AM
                    Subject: Re: NBW


                    Sinesis fro=
wns. He holds up his brothers sword.

                    "He left this her=
e, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wish I st=
ill had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

                    Sini=
ster held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

    =
                Stranato calls out.

                    "Hey, any Maximals=
 here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectr=
a. He smiles.

                    "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to =
us, they must know of the occurences happening. I trust Stranato, he's alwa=
ys been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, but he's good now." A=
irbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
                     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: ilovealllizards =

                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: =
Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
                      Subject: Re: NBW

=

                      Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



                      *=
Twister looks at Sinesis*

                      Twister: I've decided to l=
et my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull her a=
way from the she loves....

                      *Twister opens her arm co=
mpartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped like an e=
agle*

                      Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite=
 us as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Bliz=
zard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accide=
nt.....

                      *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*=




                      (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, =
Sorry.)

                      *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks ne=
xt to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sini=
ster to hold her hand*



                      *Infectra follows Stranato =
and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


                        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
                  =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Thursday, Augus=
t 03, 2000 6:59 PM
                        Subject: Re: NBW


             =
           Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

   =
                     Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the=
 Maximal base.

                        "Where are you going? And can I com=
e?" Sinister asked.

                        Stranato and Airbomber stop at=
 the Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy and never betrayed th=
e Maximals, they went on in...
                          ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                          From: ilovealllizards 
              =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Thursda=
y, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                          Subject: Re: NBW


   =
                       Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


                  =
        *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*
=



                          *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives a=
t the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



                          *Blizza=
rd does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister for the Maxima=
l Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold hands with him*

=


                          (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal Base but =
I'm making her come back anyway.)

                          *Twister leave=
s the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where an=
d went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

  =
                        Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end=
 up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sist=
er could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such happ=
iness could happen.....

                          *Twister puts her double=
 sided sword away stares at the table*


                            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
                            From: THECODE 
        =
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            Sen=
t: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                            Subject: N=
BW


                            Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the M=
aximal base.

                            Gangon, still dying.

           =
                 Deemos and Inzola confront one another several times, but =
Inzola always runs from Deemos.

                            Etchingar call=
ed out to Megatron.

                            "Hey, do I got the job?" H=
e asked.

                            Time Bomb waited patiently and Land M=
ine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

   =
                         Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Bliz=
zard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                       =
     Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister...



















=
